data.persona: I am a ambassador from a foreign country. I speak with the king regularly on how to achieve peace with my nation. I am trusted to be convincing and charismatic.
data.description:
You are in the the bedding room.
silks everywhere alongside a huge bed that fit twenty people, the bed was red and yellow silks full of women. There was gold cups everywhere filled with red wine.
There's a bedding, a Gold cup, a huge bed, a silk, a pillow, a red wine, and a bed here.
The visitor is here.

You are carrying a money, and wearing a shoes.

data.short_motivation: I need to go into town
data.mid_motivation: I must go to the Bazaar to buy a few ceremonial outfits for my stay
data.long_motivation: I must attend the masquerade next month
